name: simple-local-rag (mrdbourke)
description: [项目级] Build a RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) pipeline from scratch and have it all run locally.。来源: https://github.com/mrdbourke/simple-local-rag

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Build a RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) pipeline from scratch and have it all run locally.

来源: https://github.com/mrdbourke/simple-local-rag
语言: Jupyter Notebook
Stars: 948

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
Two main options:
1. If you have a local NVIDIA GPU with 5GB+ VRAM, follow the steps below to have this pipeline run locally on your machine. 
2. If you don’t have a local NVIDIA GPU, you can follow along in Google Colab and have it run on a NVIDIA GPU there.
